channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 10:25 The alarm has been sounded in the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in progress in:- Kupyan district- Kharkiv district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchan territorial community
item.description: 🟡 10:25 The alarm has been sounded in the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in progress in:- Kupyan district- Kharkiv district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchan territorial community#Харківська_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟠 10:00 FREE EVACUATIONWe ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for evacuation of the civilian population – 0800339291
